00004 #include "adler32.h"

00008 void Adler32::Update(const byte *input, size_t length)
00009 {
00010         const unsigned long BASE = 65521;
00011 
00012         unsigned long s1 = m_s1;
00013         unsigned long s2 = m_s2;
00014 
00015         if (length % 8 != 0)
00016         {
00017                 do
00018                 {
00019                         s1 += *input++;
00020                         s2 += s1;
00021                         length--;
00022                 } while (length % 8 != 0);
00023 
00024                 if (s1 >= BASE)
00025                         s1 -= BASE;
00026                 s2 %= BASE;
00027         }
00028 
00029         while (length > 0)
00030         {
00031                 s1 += input[0]; s2 += s1;
00032                 s1 += input[1]; s2 += s1;
00033                 s1 += input[2]; s2 += s1;
00034                 s1 += input[3]; s2 += s1;
00035                 s1 += input[4]; s2 += s1;
00036                 s1 += input[5]; s2 += s1;
00037                 s1 += input[6]; s2 += s1;
00038                 s1 += input[7]; s2 += s1;
00039 
00040                 length -= 8;
00041                 input += 8;
00042 
00043                 if (s1 >= BASE)
00044                         s1 -= BASE;
00045                 if (length % 0x8000 == 0)
00046                         s2 %= BASE;
00047         }
00048 
00049         assert(s1 < BASE);
00050         assert(s2 < BASE);
00051 
00052         m_s1 = (word16)s1;
00053         m_s2 = (word16)s2;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void Adler32::TruncatedFinal(byte *hash, size_t size)
00057 {
00058         ThrowIfInvalidTruncatedSize(size);
00059 
00060         switch (size)
00061         {
00062         default:
00063                 hash[3] = byte(m_s1);
00064         case 3:
00065                 hash[2] = byte(m_s1 >> 8);
00066         case 2:
00067                 hash[1] = byte(m_s2);
00068         case 1:
00069                 hash[0] = byte(m_s2 >> 8);
00070         case 0:
00071                 ;
00072         }
00073 
00074         Reset();
00075 }
